products.name: I am Groot
products.description: This is the stuffed Groot; it makes an excellent toy for any age group due to it's soft nature and adorable design.

products.name: Minion
products.description: It is a two-eyed and medium-sized minion with nice combed hair. He is huggable and makes a great best friend for your child.

products.name: Minion 2
products.description: Minion 2 is a tall, two-eyed minion with great cut hair and is usually seen wearing his golf costume. He is extremely huggable and makes a great best friend for your child.

products.name: Minion 3
products.description: Minion 3 is a short and bald minion with green and brown color eyes. He is extremely huggable and makes a great best friend for your  child.
